description:
What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula. Join his descendants, the famed Belmont clan as they seek his ultimate destruction.

• Intense whip combat and platforming.

• Huge adventure with deep exploration and challenges.

• Explore Dracula's castle and discover its darkest secrets.
